title: Dark Piano, vol. II Music Pack
description: 12 dark, solo piano music tracks designed for Horror games of all types.
longDescription:
This pack contains 12 seamlessly looping music tracks (16-bit, 44.1kHz wav files) and 26 mins, 24 secs of original music.


This dark piano pack is designed to fit many different styles of horror games. Whether it’s an RPG-style survival horror, psychological horror, point-and-click horror, or a horror visual novel, this pack will give a wide variety of moods to your game: Tense and suspenseful stealth themes, frightening chase themes, tragic plot-point cues and eerie area loops are just some of the moods you will find in this pack. From evil and creepy to mischievously playful, these 12 piano tracks will evoke a wide array of emotions. Three of the tracks include alternate versions with additional effects applied to the piano for maximum spookiness! (Run-time: 26 mins, 24 secs)


Three of the tracks include alternate versions with additional effects applied to the piano for maximum spookiness!


You can listen to the music pack in full before purchasing here:


https://soundcloud.com/aleksis_tristan_shaw/sets/dark-piano-vol-ii


TRACKLIST


Bleak and Desolate (LOOP) [1:48]


The Hall of Images (LOOP) [3:18]


The Deplorable Word (LOOP) [2:47]


Threnody for an Empty World (LOOP) [3:12]


Unspoken Pangs (LOOP) [2:57]


Scalding, Bitter Tears (LOOP) [2:24]


Penrose Stairs (LOOP) [1:09]


Time is Running Out (LOOP) [0:25]


Trepidation (LOOP) [0:34]


Death Wish (LOOP) [2:54]


House of Undoing (LOOP) [3:33]


Pyrrhic (LOOP) [1:59]
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  12 looping, dark, solo piano music tracks
  •  3 alternate version tracks with additional FX applied to the piano

Number of Audio Wavs: 17

Number of Audio Cues: 17

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 26 mins, 24 secs

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
